name: geonetwork-french-tunaatlas.d4science.org/geonetwork/
description: Metadata catalog and interactive map viewer for the FIRMS Global Tuna Atlas, disseminating authoritative, global, standardized overviews of historic tuna and related fisheries catch data, with harmonized datasets for scientific, management, and climate adaptation purposes.
owner_name: FIRMS Partnership (FAO, IRD France, and t-RFMOs)
